name: luisgen
description: LUISGen is a tool for generating C# class or Typescript interface for a LUIS app to make consuming LUIS output easier.
author: Microsoft
comments: There is a bug in handling .njsproj in dotnet so we need to expand into each project rather than just using the solution.

scripts.test: dotnet.exe test src/luisgentest/luisgentest.csproj && cd src/luisgentestjs/ && npm run-script build && npm run-script test
scripts.clean: dotnet.exe clean src/luisgen/luisgen.csproj && dotnet.exe clean src/luisgentest/luisgentest.csproj && cd src/luisgentestjs/ && npm run clean
